headline: Spotlight Wisconsin: Angry Packers Fans And a Surging Virus
text: Welcome to Poll Watch, our weekly look at polling data and survey research on the candidates, voters and issues that will shape the 2020 election. Follow our daily updates on the latest presidential election polls.
snippet: With the coronavirus raging in the state, particularly in the politically competitive northeast, the president faces an uphill battle to repeat his 2016 victory.
